advancement.tcrcore.Otchłani_eye.desc: §a§oKiedy Otchłań pożarła lądy, On zaszył się na dnie morza, Jego ciało stając się miastem bąbelków.
advancement.tcrcore.Otchłani_kill.desc: Defeat The Leviathan and obtain Tide Claw.
advancement.tcrcore.cursed_eye.desc: §a§oWhen the betrayer pierced her spine, frozen tears instantly sealed three thousand ghost ships.
advancement.tcrcore.cursed_kill.desc: Defeat Maledictus and obtain Soul-Severing War Halberd.
advancement.tcrcore.desert_eye.desc: §a§oThe guardians are not monsters; they are living tombstones willingly transformed by the people.
advancement.tcrcore.desert_kill.desc: Defeat Ancient Remnant and obtain Sandstorm's Wrath.
advancement.tcrcore.ef_legacy.desc: All can be obtained through crafting, featuring different weapon skills and animation templates. Check JEI for recipes and skill info.
advancement.tcrcore.flame_eye.desc: §a§oWhere magma surged, He gouged out His heart, forging an eternal beacon.
advancement.tcrcore.flame_kill.desc: Defeat Ignis and obtain Cremation Burial.
advancement.tcrcore.kill_pillager.desc: The task is complete. Time to return to the Strażnik Sanktuarium.
advancement.tcrcore.mark_map.desc: Strażnik Sanktuarium has marked the locations of the scattered Divine Eyes on your map. Now, go reclaim them!
advancement.tcrcore.storm_eye.desc: §a§oWhen war tore the clouds, she used the storm as a stairway, building a suspended paradise for her people.
advancement.tcrcore.storm_kill.desc: Defeat Scylla and obtain Courtyard Wave Anchor Halberd.
advancement.tcrcore.tcrcore.desc: Where the dream begins. Head to the The Sanctuary to find the Strażnik Sanktuarium.
advancement.tcrcore.tcrcore_weapon.desc: All obtainable and adapted Bronie or materials. Check [JEI] for acquisition methods and details.
block.block_factorys_bosses.dragon_skull: Obtained by defeating the §c[Underworld Knight]§r or §4[Infernal Dragon]§r
block.minecraft.dragon_egg.tcr_info: Obtained by defeating the §d[Ender Dragon]§r in the §dEnd§r
entity.minecraft.villager.answer0: Mambo, mambo, oh my gilly, mambo~
entity.minecraft.villager.answer4: Hakimi nanbei ludou~ Axi ga axi~
entity.minecraft.villager.answer5: Ding dong ji~ Ding dong ji~
entity.minecraft.villager.option1: [It seems the local residents are heavily corrupted!]
entity.minecraft.villager.option3: [Why can't I understand the villagers' language...]
entity.tcrcore.girl.answer0: Long time no see, esteemed one!
entity.tcrcore.girl.answer1: Have you forgotten me? I am the Ferry girl of the Saint Temple, here to guide the lost. If you have any rare treasures, show them to me. I can extract their memoria and transform them into artifacts! When you can set foot in §cthe Nether§f or §dthe End§f, I can also give you a ride.
entity.tcrcore.girl.answer2: If you have sufficient experience, open the skill panel to learn skills. §6Click the experience orb in the top right corner of the skill tree interface to convert experience into skill points.§f Skill allocation is crucial; consider learning skills that enhance survivability, like Health Boost!
entity.tcrcore.girl.answer3: I am the Ferry girl of the Saint Temple, here to guide the lost. If you have any rare treasures, show them to me. I can extract their memoria and transform them into artifacts! When you can set foot in §cthe Nether§f or §dthe End§f, I can also give you a ride. As a first meeting gift, take this artifact. Naciśnij §d[%s]§f to deploy the sail and travel thousands of miles!
entity.tcrcore.girl.answer4: Esteemed one, are you sure you wish to go? I cannot bring you back... Please ensure you have the Waystone with you.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer0: So... you drifted here from beyond this world? As you prepared to land, an unfamiliar deity pulled you into a barrier, and then you lost consciousness?
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer1: Jestem Strażnikiem Sanktuarium tego świata. That day, the heavens were abnormal, thunder roared, and a meteor fell into the sea. I rescued you from the depths. You must be the celestial warriors foretold in the ancient prophecy.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer10: Simply give the §d『Oracle Fragments』§f to me, and I will reveal the ember locations recorded in the oracle! Then you can head to the places I mark on your map, defeat the monsters, reclaim the embers, §6and offer them at the altars in the hall§f. Once all embers are gathered, we can initiate the ritual to purify the §d「Black Tide」§f!
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer11: Outsider... You didn't really think you were some savior, did you... Hahahaha, you are merely a puppet I used to reclaim my power!
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer12: The Underworld Knight you defeated, the puppet of Sky Island, the Chimera in the prison, and the cursed crew under the Captain—they were the true divine guardians of this world, obstructing my grand plan! Their disappearance matters little, even if it costs a few illagers. Moreover, the deity embers you brought back will help me rebuild my physical form.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer13: Who am I? A sacrifice like you has no right to know! There is no foolish ritual! After absorbing your power, the world shall be under my rule! Die!
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer14: This... I once battled the §d「Black Tide Legion」§f here. The spirits sealed by the damaged altars will never return... But the remaining spirits are enough to initiate the exorcism ritual.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer15: §bThe Storm Ember§f... I sense it is scattered in §6[%s]§f. Defeat %s to reclaim it! I have marked the location of §6[%s§6]§f on your map. I will wait here. §3[%s§3]§f, you might check with the Ferry girl; perhaps you can exchange for some treasure. §dThe Ferry girl§f awaits you at the §6harbor of the Saint Temple§f.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer16: §3The Otchłani Ember§f... I sense it is scattered in §6[%s]§f. Defeat %s to reclaim it! I have marked the location of §6[%s§6]§f on your map. I will wait here. §c[%s§c]§f, you might check with the Ferry girl; perhaps you can exchange for some treasure.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer17: §2The Cursed Ember§f... I sense it is scattered in §6[%s]§f. Defeat %s to reclaim it! I have marked the location of §6[%s§6]§f on your map. I will wait here. §c[%s§c]§f, you might check with the Ferry girl; perhaps you can exchange for some treasure.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer18: §eThe Desert Ember§f... I sense it is scattered in §6[%s]§f. Defeat %s to reclaim it! I have marked the location of §6[%s§6]§f on your map. I will wait here. §e[%s§e]§f, you might check with the Ferry girl; perhaps you can exchange for some treasure.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer19: §6The Flame Ember§f... I sense it is scattered in §6[%s]§f. Defeat %s to reclaim it! I have marked the location of §6[%s§6]§f on your map. I will wait here. §c[%s§c]§f, you might check with the Ferry girl; perhaps you can exchange for some treasure.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer2: Once, there was a glorious kingdom here, protected by heroic spirits. Until one day, the §d「Black Tide」§f descended upon the world, corrupting all things. Even some villagers were darkened into illagers. The gods, unable to resist the §d「Black Tide」§f, became spirits. As the ancient prophecy foretold, I sealed their remaining power here. §6However, fragments of their embers are still scattered across the world.§f I am cursed and cannot leave this place, so I can only wait silently for a savior to arrive...
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer20: How did you get extra Oracle Fragments by following the normal流程? Did you steal them from someone?
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer3: The ancient prophecy states that once you ignite all the embers, you can rebuild the temple, obtain the power of the spirits, and perform the ritual to cleanse the §d「Black Tide」§f! But before that, first §6defeat an illager§f and then§f return to me.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer4: It seems you truly are the prophesied savior! Have you collected any §d『Oracle Fragments』§f during your journey? Give the §d『Oracle Fragments』§f to me, and I will reveal the locations of the embers recorded in the oracle! Once you ignite all the embers, I will initiate the §d「Black Tide」§f cleansing ritual!
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer6: Since you have proven your strength, I will drop my disguise and show you my true form.
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer7: §d『Oracle Fragment!』§f Give it to me, and I will reveal the ember locations it records, along with the blessings bestowed by the oracle!
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer8: O prophesied savior, what troubles you?
entity.tcrcore.guider.answer9: The §dEnder Dragon§f, located in the End's alien space, has deep connections to the §d「Black Tide」§f. After defeating it, the essence it births can be forged into the Yamato, a power from another world beyond measure. However, be warned: after the extradimensional dragon vanishes, the world affected by the §d「Black Tide」§f will cause monsters' health to double!
entity.tcrcore.guider.option1: Who are you? Why did you save me?
entity.tcrcore.guider.option16: Other damaged altars in the hall?
